languages.text: "Гален — один из младших членов рода Гапрак... Несмотря на свой немолодой возраст, он не занимал высокого положения, но всегда старался достичь большего, чем мог. Многие члены моего рода... непросто переживали несчастье, случившееся с Кьявой Гамма и всеми нами. Не все сразу смирились с нашим нынешним положением. Гален был одним из них".

traits.locale_text: "Гален — один из младших членов рода Гапрак... Несмотря на свой немолодой возраст, он не занимал высокого положения, но всегда старался достичь большего, чем мог. Не подумайте, что из эгоистичных целей. Им всегда двигало желание приумножить богатства и влияние нашей семьи, даже есть и не получалось..."

languages.text: "Halen is one of the lower-ranking members of House Gaprak... Despite his advanced age, he never held high office, but he was forever striving to better his position, even beyond his abilities. Many members of my house... struggled to cope with the misfortune that befell Kiava Gamma and our family. Some members could not reconcile themselves to our new position. Halen was one of them."
languages.original_text: "Гален — один из младших членов рода Гапрак... Несмотря на свой немолодой возраст, он не занимал высокого положения, но всегда старался достичь большего, чем мог. Многие члены моего рода... непросто переживали несчастье, случившееся с Кьявой Гамма и всеми нами. Не все сразу смирились с нашим нынешним положением. Гален был одним из них".

traits.locale_text: "Halen is one of the junior members of the House Gaprak... Despite his elderly age, he did not occupy a high position, yet always strived to achieve more than he could. Many members of my family... had a hard time dealing with the misfortune that befell the Kiava Gamma and our family. Not everyone had made peace with our current situation, and Halen was among those."

"Halen is one of the junior members of the House Gaprak... Despite his elderly age, he did not occupy a high position, yet always strived to achieve more than he could. Many members of my family... had a hard time dealing with the misfortune that befell the Kiava Gamma and our family. Not everyone had made peace with our current situation, and Halen was among those."

Many members of my family... had a hard time dealing with the misfortune that befell Kiava Gamma and our family. Not everyone put up with our current situation and Halen was among those who did not."

"Halen is one of the junior members of House Gaprak... Despite his elderly age, he did not hold high office, yet always strived to achieve more than he could. Many members of my family... had a hard time dealing with the misfortune that befell Kiava Gamma and our family. Not everyone put up with our current situation and Halen was among those who did not."

Many members of my house... struggled to cope with the misfortune that befell Kiava Gamma and our family. Some members could not reconcile themselves to our new position. Halen was one of them."

"Halen is one of the lower-ranking members of House Gaprak... Despite his advanced age, he never held high office, but he was forever striving to better his position, even beyond his abilities. Many members of my house... struggled to cope with the misfortune that befell Kiava Gamma and our family. Some members could not reconcile themselves to our new position. Halen was one of them."

languages.text: 「ヘイレンは、ギャプラック家では経歴の浅いひとりです…高齢にも関わらず高い地位には就いていませんでしたが、いつも自分にできる以上のことを成そうと努力していました。ギャプラック一族の多くは…キアヴァ・ガンマとわが家に生じた逆境に悪戦苦闘していました。全員が私達の新しい立場に納得しているわけでもなく、ヘイレンもそのひとりでした」
languages.original_text: "Halen is one of the lower-ranking members of House Gaprak... Despite his advanced age, he never held high office, but he was forever striving to better his position, even beyond his abilities. Many members of my house... struggled to cope with the misfortune that befell Kiava Gamma and our family. Some members could not reconcile themselves to our new position. Halen was one of them."

traits.locale_text: 「ヘイレンは、ギャプラック家では経歴の浅いひとりです…高齢にも関わらず高い地位には就いていませんでしたが、いつも自分にできる以上のことを成そうと努力していました。ギャプラック一族の多くは…キアヴァ・ガンマとわが家に生じた逆境に悪戦苦闘していました。全員が私達の新しい立場に納得しているわけでもなく、ヘイレンもそのひとりでした」

languages.text: “哈伦是贾帕克家族中平平无奇的成员……年龄不小，一无所成。他总是不知满足，丝毫不明白何为量力而行。我们家族中的许多人……都仍在努力承受基亚瓦伽马星事件带来的不幸后果。然而，其中一部分成员却无法接受现状，而哈伦正是其中之一。”
languages.original_text: "Halen is one of the lower-ranking members of House Gaprak... Despite his advanced age, he never held high office, but he was forever striving to better his position, even beyond his abilities. Many members of my house... struggled to cope with the misfortune that befell Kiava Gamma and our family. Some members could not reconcile themselves to our new position. Halen was one of them."

traits.locale_text: “哈伦是贾帕克家族中平平无奇的成员……年龄不小，一无所成。他总是不知满足，丝毫不明白何为量力而行。我们家族中的许多人……都仍在努力承受基亚瓦伽马星事件带来的不幸后果。然而，其中一部分成员却无法接受现状，而哈伦正是其中之一。”

languages.text: « Halen fait partie des membres inférieurs de la maison Gaprak. Malgré son âge avancé, il n'a jamais occupé de poste important, mais il a toujours tout fait pour gravir les échelons, même s'il n'en avait pas la capacité. L'incident de Kiava Gamma a eu un impact considérable sur notre famille. Beaucoup ont eu du mal à accepter notre déchéance... Halen en faisait partie. »
languages.original_text: "Halen is one of the lower-ranking members of House Gaprak... Despite his advanced age, he never held high office, but he was forever striving to better his position, even beyond his abilities. Many members of my house... struggled to cope with the misfortune that befell Kiava Gamma and our family. Some members could not reconcile themselves to our new position. Halen was one of them."

traits.locale_text: « Halen fait partie des membres inférieurs de la maison Gaprak. Malgré son âge avancé, il n'a jamais occupé de poste important, mais il a toujours tout fait pour gravir les échelons, même s'il n'en avait pas la capacité. L'incident de Kiava Gamma a eu un impact considérable sur notre famille. Beaucoup ont eu du mal à accepter notre déchéance... Halen en faisait partie. »

languages.text: «Halen era uno de los miembros de menor rango de la casa Gaprak... Pese a su avanzada edad, nunca llegó a ocupar un cargo elevado, aunque siempre se esforzó por mejorar su posición, yendo más allá de lo que sus facultades le permitían. A muchos miembros de mi casa les... costó aceptar la desgracia acaecida en Kiava Gamma y su efecto sobre nuestra familia. Algunos miembros no han logrado hacerse a la idea de nuestra nueva posición. Halen era uno de ellos».
languages.original_text: "Halen is one of the lower-ranking members of House Gaprak... Despite his advanced age, he never held high office, but he was forever striving to better his position, even beyond his abilities. Many members of my house... struggled to cope with the misfortune that befell Kiava Gamma and our family. Some members could not reconcile themselves to our new position. Halen was one of them."

traits.locale_text: «Halen era uno de los miembros de menor rango de la casa Gaprak... Pese a su avanzada edad, nunca llegó a ocupar un cargo elevado, aunque siempre se esforzó por mejorar su posición, yendo más allá de lo que sus facultades le permitían. A muchos miembros de mi casa les... costó aceptar la desgracia acaecida en Kiava Gamma y su efecto sobre nuestra familia. Algunos miembros no han logrado hacerse a la idea de nuestra nueva posición. Halen era uno de ellos».

languages.text: "Halen ist eines der eher niederen Mitglieder des Hauses Gaprak ... Trotz seines fortgeschrittenen Alters hat nie ein hohes Amt bekleidet, aber stets versucht, seine Position ungeachtet seiner Fähigkeiten zu verbessern. Vielen Angehörigen meines Hauses ... fällt es schwer, das Unglück zu ertragen, das Kiava Gamma und unsere Familie ereilt hat. Einige von ihnen konnten sich nicht mit unserer neuen Position arrangieren. Halen war einer von ihnen."
languages.original_text: "Halen is one of the lower-ranking members of House Gaprak... Despite his advanced age, he never held high office, but he was forever striving to better his position, even beyond his abilities. Many members of my house... struggled to cope with the misfortune that befell Kiava Gamma and our family. Some members could not reconcile themselves to our new position. Halen was one of them."

traits.locale_text: "Halen ist eines der niederen Mitglieder des Hauses Gaprak ... Trotz seines hohen Alters hatte er noch nie ein hohes Amt inne. Er hat jedoch immer danach gestrebt, mehr zu erreichen, als es ihm möglich war. Viele Mitglieder meiner Familie ... hatten Probleme, mit dem Unglück umzugehen, welches Kiava Gamma und unsere Familie ereilt hat. Nicht alle haben sich mit unserer aktuellen Lage abgefunden. Auch Halen nicht."

languages.text: "Halen, Gaprak Hanesi'nin alt kademelerindeki bir üyesidir... Yaşı ileri olsa da üst makamlarda hiç görev yapmamış; elinden gelenin de fazlasını yaparak daima kendi makamını yüceltmeye çalışmıştır. Üyelerimizin çoğu... Kiava Gama'nın ve hanemizin başına gelen talihsizliği kaldırmakta zorlanmıştır. Aramızdan bazıları, yeni mevkimizi kendilerine layık görmemiştir. Halen da bunlardan biri olmuştur."
languages.original_text: "Halen is one of the lower-ranking members of House Gaprak... Despite his advanced age, he never held high office, but he was forever striving to better his position, even beyond his abilities. Many members of my house... struggled to cope with the misfortune that befell Kiava Gamma and our family. Some members could not reconcile themselves to our new position. Halen was one of them."

traits.locale_text: "Halen, Gaprak Hanesi'nin alt kademelerindeki bir üyesidir... Yaşı ileri olsa da üst makamlarda hiç görev yapmamış; elinden gelenin de fazlasını yaparak daima kendi makamını yüceltmeye çalışmıştır. Üyelerimizin çoğu... Kiava Gama'nın ve hanemizin başına gelen talihsizliği kaldırmakta zorlanmıştır. Aramızdan bazıları, yeni mevkimizi kendilerine layık görmemiştir. Halen da bunlardan biri olmuştur."
